channel.title: swopnilnep on Computer Science Society
channel.description: Recent content in swopnilnep on Computer Science Society

item.title: Hackathon Sunday April 13th
item.description: Happy Friday! Hackathon is happening in one week! On Saturday April 13th, the day-long event will kick-off in Olin 202 at 10AM with team formation and project brainstorming/selection. Individuals and teams will then be able to spend the day working towards creating a functioning product. Project presentations (and prizes!) will be in Olin 202 at 8PM. A few notes: 1. It is not required for participants to stay in the room the whole day, nor spend the entire time working on the project.

item.title: Upcoming DS Talks
item.description: Hi everyone! If you’re looking for a bright spot amidst the April snow, check out the following lectures tomorrow and Friday, presented by Justin Marschall, a 2012 Luther Grad! Data Science Careers for Behavioral and Social Science Majors Thursday, April 11 6:30 pm Valders 362 In an emergent, multidisciplinary field, data scientists come from diverse backgrounds. This talk highlights how one Luther 2012 psychology major pursued a career in the field of data science, while giving advice for other social science majors to do the same.

item.title: Welcome to CSS!
item.description: Welcome to the official website of the Luther College Computer Science Society! For the 2018-2019 year, our executives are: Alexander Davis: President James Miller: Vice President Karina Hoff: Treasurer Swopnil N. Shrestha: Secretary We are excited to be able to host events and workshops for the betterment of the CS community at Luther. Hope to see you at out meetings!
